entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
